tool_description: Capture and analyze screenshots using computer vision models

available_commands.description: Capture screenshot for description of screen contents
Analyze current screen with specific question (optional monitor selection)

tool_usage_guidance: Use screenshot to see and analyze what's on the primary screen
Use analyze with specific questions about screen content
Optional second argument for monitor index (0, 1, 2...) defaults to primary
Vision model processes images and provides detailed descriptions
Best for understanding UI state, debugging visual issues, and screen content analysis
proactive_triggers: When user asks 'what's on my screen'
When user requests to see current application state
When user mentions needing to see UI elements
When context about screen content would help answer questions

metadata.notes: Requires Ollama running with vision model. Refactored to modern architecture.
